meanings.definition: A thick soup containing vegetables, beans, and pasta.
meanings.sent1: I enjoyed a warm bowl of minestrone for lunch.
meanings.sent2: My mom makes the best minestrone soup on cold days.
meanings.sent3: The minestrone was so thick, it could almost stand on its own!
meanings.sent4: Her minestrone was a hearty hug in a bowl.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the simmering minestrone filled the kitchen with comfort.

meanings.definition: A dish made with minestrone soup.
meanings.sent1: For dinner, we had a delicious minestrone casserole.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant's menu featured various dishes with minestrone.
meanings.sent3: She surprised us with a minestrone pie for dessert!
meanings.sent4: The potluck was a minestrone feast of creativity and flavors.
meanings.sent5: The potluck was a minestrone feast of creativity and flavors.
